Message: Exeption enum was accepted as int for get_pixbuf() parameter ... caused adjust tool to display psychadelic
Description: image.
Message Abstract: Exeption enum was accepted as int for get_pixbuf() parameter ... caused adjust tool to display psychadelic
Description Abstract: image.

Message: Callers to PhotoTransformer.get_pixbuf now must specify a scale, to discourage pipeline transformations of
Description: unscaled pixbufs.  Support added for retrieving pixbufs at screen size, which is adequate for most display  operations.  Beefed-up the get_preview_pixbuf() method, which encourages using lower-quality but  fully-transformed pixbufs when possible.
Message Abstract: Callers to PhotoTransformer.get_pixbuf now must specify a scale, to discourage pipeline transformations of
Description Abstract: unscaled pixbufs.  Support added for retrieving pixbufs at screen size, which is adequate for most display  operations.  Beefed-up the get_preview_pixbuf() method, which encourages using lower-quality but  fully-transformed pixbufs when possible.

Message: restructured queryable interfaces to return static types
Message Abstract: restructured queryable interfaces to return static types

Message: 372: Import DND modifier keys.  Note that Move is not implemented, for reasons I detail in #603.
Message Abstract: 372: Import DND modifier keys.  Note that Move is not implemented, for reasons I detail in #603.

Message: Added instrumentation to Photo pixbuf pipeline to measure absolute time of each stage.  Also added feature to
Description: allow caller to declare a scale for the pixbuf; Photo can perform the scale at an opportune time and reduce  overhead in certain operations.  Also fixed bug where the Thumbnail objects in the entire system were being  resized when the slider moved; now, only those that are in view are resized, and the others resize when they  come into view.
Message Abstract: Added instrumentation to Photo pixbuf pipeline to measure absolute time of each stage.  Also added feature to
Description Abstract: allow caller to declare a scale for the pixbuf; Photo can perform the scale at an opportune time and reduce  overhead in certain operations.  Also fixed bug where the Thumbnail objects in the entire system were being  resized when the slider moved; now, only those that are in view are resized, and the others resize when they  come into view.

Message: 380: X server corruption when selecting with compositing WM fixed.  Different technique used, which should actually be faster and results in nicer presentation.
Message Abstract: 380: X server corruption when selecting with compositing WM fixed.  Different technique used, which should actually be faster and results in nicer presentation.

Message: Previous version segfaults on 64-bit builds.  Issue is a bad binding for KeyFile; see
Description: http://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=588104  KeyFile is only used in the database in PhotoTable.  It  appears the adjustment code (when compiled for release) exposed the binding problem.  Now using a custom vapi  until the binding is fixed.
Message Abstract: Previous version segfaults on 64-bit builds.  Issue is a bad binding for KeyFile; see
Description Abstract: link  KeyFile is only used in the database in PhotoTable.  It  appears the adjustment code (when compiled for release) exposed the binding problem.  Now using a custom vapi  until the binding is fixed.

Message: 439: Resorting photos with large collection does not take so much time.  This one has been bugging me for a
Description: long time.  I replaced SortedList's inane insertion sort with a less-inane binary insertion sort.  Photo now  caches exposure_time to speed up comparisons, as going out to the database every time was too expensive.  Both  changes result in a marked improvement for the user.  Also made Sort By Exposure Time / Descending the default,  as that's more interesting for the user.  Also spotted a subtle bug in fullscreen window; fixed.
Message Abstract: 439: Resorting photos with large collection does not take so much time.  This one has been bugging me for a
Description Abstract: long time.  I replaced SortedList's inane insertion sort with a less-inane binary insertion sort.  Photo now  caches exposure_time to speed up comparisons, as going out to the database every time was too expensive.  Both  changes result in a marked improvement for the user.  Also made Sort By Exposure Time / Descending the default,  as that's more interesting for the user.  Also spotted a subtle bug in fullscreen window; fixed.

Message: Fixed an off-by-one error when rotating and derotating crop dimensions.
Message Abstract: Fixed an off-by-one error when rotating and derotating crop dimensions.

Message: Major overhaul to improve responsiveness of editing photos and generating new thumbnails.  All modifications to the photo stored in the database are stored in the photo's original, unrotated coordinate system, which means they do not have to be adjusted whenever the image is rotated.  Some refactoring, including making Orientation a powerhouse of its own.
Message Abstract: Major overhaul to improve responsiveness of editing photos and generating new thumbnails.  All modifications to the photo stored in the database are stored in the photo's original, unrotated coordinate system, which means they do not have to be adjusted whenever the image is rotated.  Some refactoring, including making Orientation a powerhouse of its own.

Message: Major improvement to performance when moving and resizing the crop tool.  For now, the crop tool is embedded in the PhotoPage class; should be broken out in the near future.  Probably will do when another editing tool is introduced and the abstractions become more necessary.
Message Abstract: Major improvement to performance when moving and resizing the crop tool.  For now, the crop tool is embedded in the PhotoPage class; should be broken out in the near future.  Probably will do when another editing tool is introduced and the abstractions become more necessary.

Message: Major refactoring in preparation for photo editing.  New Photo object centralizes pixbuf generation and photo manipulation, and introduces GObject signals into the system so various interested parties (esp. various pages) are notified when a photo is modified or removed.  Also refactored Dimensions struct, as what started out as a utility record has become a first-class citizen of Shotwell.  Also, while refactoring, went ahead and made changes to reflect Yorba's coding style (i.e. camelCase for variables -> underscored_names).  In the process, knocked out #198: Databases and thumbnail cache always in sync with modifications.  #202: Black-and-white shading with crop tool.
Message Abstract: Major refactoring in preparation for photo editing.  New Photo object centralizes pixbuf generation and photo manipulation, and introduces GObject signals into the system so various interested parties (esp. various pages) are notified when a photo is modified or removed.  Also refactored Dimensions struct, as what started out as a utility record has become a first-class citizen of Shotwell.  Also, while refactoring, went ahead and made changes to reflect Yorba's coding style (i.e. camelCase for variables -> underscored_names).  In the process, knocked out #198: Databases and thumbnail cache always in sync with modifications.  #202: Black-and-white shading with crop tool.

Message: Speed improvements for large photo collections.  More work to be done.

Message: 85: Added right-click/Remove on thumbnail.  #87: Photo scaling is
Description: improved by generating higher-quality thumbnails to disk and better  in-memory scaling.  #90 and #91: Detailed in Wiki, implemented  throughout.
Message Abstract: 85: Added right-click/Remove on thumbnail.  #87: Photo scaling is
Description Abstract: improved by generating higher-quality thumbnails to disk and better  in-memory scaling.  #90 and #91: Detailed in Wiki, implemented  throughout.

Message: Thumbnail dimensions are now stored in a table rather than fetched from
Description: disk and examined.  This speeds up init time, esp. with large  collections.
Message Abstract: Thumbnail dimensions are now stored in a table rather than fetched from
Description Abstract: disk and examined.  This speeds up init time, esp. with large  collections.

Message: Updated the cache to store JPEG data in memory and convert to pixbufs on
Description: the fly.  Thumbnails only hold pixbufs when they're on screen, otherwise  they're tossed.  Fixed #86.
Message Abstract: Updated the cache to store JPEG data in memory and convert to pixbufs on
Description Abstract: the fly.  Thumbnails only hold pixbufs when they're on screen, otherwise  they're tossed.  Fixed #86.

Message: Added adjustable thumbnail sizing, however, need to add UI slider for
Description: ticket to be marked off.  Implemented a persistent thumbnail cache. Began work to have thumbnail objects on-screen load and unload their  pixbufs dynamically.
